metadata.title: Britney Spears - Baby One More Time
metadata.creator: Britney Spears

tracks.text: Sitting in a high school classroom, a girl with black heeled shoes and tights taps her foot against the leg of her desk.

It's Britney Spears. She taps her pencil against a book while staring at the clock. She wears a white button up shirt, gray cardigan, and a pink fluffy scrunchy in her hair. Her dirty blond hair is done up in twin braids, which reach below her shoulders.
She watches the clock approach 3pm. A teacher with red glasses glares at her.
The students grab their backpacks. In the hallway, students run from their classrooms, wearing private school uniforms.

Spears stands in the hallway, looks at us, and raises an arm in a pose. Her white shirt has been tied into a bow, revealing her midriff. Behind her, 2 girls with similarly styled shirts and black skirts pose with her.
More girls join behind them. They dance down the hallway.
Students open their lockers, toss out items, and change clothes. Spears and the girls continue dance in their own hallway, rocking side to side and spinning around.
Boys in uniforms dance and twirl behind the girls.
Spears sings to us, standing in front of some lockers.
The backup dancer girls move to the back. A dozen boys replace them, throw their arms out and twirl.
Spears, the backup dancers, and other students run down the hall.
In front of some cars, Spears and boys in sports uniforms dance. Spears is wearing a hot pink sports bra and white sear pants. Her hair is down, except for 2 locks forming small pig tails.
Spears does a back hand spring while the boys near by spin in circles.
Spears sits in a convertible and sings to us. She rests her head on her arms, looking distant.
In front of the cars, Spears and sporty looking students dance, moving their arms like windmills and their hips in circles.
A basketball dancer breakdances, while Spears and other students watch from a distance.
Spears dances, putting her hands on her heart, then spreading her arms wide. She throws her hands in the air.
Another basketball player breakdances. Spears does a forward hand spring.
Spears holds a basketball, while sitting on gym bleachers. She wears a yellow athletic crop top and red sweat pants with slits down the side.
She looks at us, the looks at a muscular basketball player. He returns her gaze.
He's gone.
Spears and dozens of students in sports clothes dance in the gym.
The dancers walk forward while crossing their legs. They run their hands down their bodies, lean forward, pop back up, and then shift their hips side to side.
Spears and the 15 dancers grab their neighbors hands and throw their heads back then forward.
In the bleachers, Spears looks at us, holding a basketball.
On the gym floor, Spears dances.
Player 91 tries to dunk a basketball, but misses. He later dribbles a ball, while 2 others guard him.
Player 10 sits in the bleachers. Smiling, he shakes hands with a girl next to him.
On the gym floor, Spears twirls, lands on her knees, throws her hands back, twirls on her knees, stands, and twirls again.
A girl in pants runs, jumps, and slides along the floor.
The teacher with red glasses walks into the gym with her hands on her hips. Spears and students twirl, then lean back, throwing their arms dramatically behind them.
The teacher drops one of her hands, and looks around. She puts her hands up and begins dancing. Spears dances, and the students form a circle around her. She kicks a foot in the air, over her head.
The students look at the bell and run for the door, shoving past the teacher.
Back at the opening scene, Spears looks off dreamily. She taps here pencil and smiles. Fade to black.
